candidates.reason: Swarm Consensus (2 votes): openrouter_llama: This bitcoin proxy and mining stock follows crypto cycles, similar to MARA. Its high volatility and recent price decline make it a potential mean reversion candidate, especially if crypto prices recover.; xai: HUT (Hut 8 Mining) is another crypto mining play like WULF and MARA, with high volatility from Bitcoin halvings and energy costs driving boom/bust cycles. Recent price decline due to operational challenges offers mean reversion potential on efficiency improvements or crypto recovery; commodity-like exposure to power/electricity adds weather/volatility layers similar to EQT, ideal for energy-crypto rotation.
